00019 using std::endl;

00023 namespace TenUI {
00024         
00025         class FontFamilyData {
00026         public:
00027                 enum FontFamilyData_Exception { FT2_EXCEPTION, FONT_FILE_EXCEPTION, FONTFILE_FONTFAMILY_MISMATCH, FONTSTYLE_ALREADY_EXISTS };
00028                 enum FontFamily_Style { DEFAULT, BOLD, ITALIC, BOLD_ITALIC, UNSUPPORTED };
00029                 
00030                 string fontFamily;
00031                 unsigned int h;                                 
00032                 
00033                 GLuint *defaultTextures;        
00034                 GLuint defaultListBase;         
00035         
00036                 GLuint *boldTextures;           
00037                 GLuint boldListBase;            
00038                 
00039                 GLuint *italicTextures;         
00040                 GLuint italicListBase;          
00041                 
00042                 GLuint *boldItalicTextures;     
00043                 GLuint boldItalicListBase;      
00044                         
00045         public:
00046                 FontFamilyData(const string &famName, unsigned int height);
00047                 virtual ~FontFamilyData();
00048                 
00049                 static string getFontFile_FamilyName(const string& fontFile) throw(FontFamilyData::FontFamilyData_Exception);
00050                 static FontFamily_Style getFontFile_Style(const string& fontFile) throw(FontFamilyData::FontFamilyData_Exception);
00051         
00052                 GLuint getStyleListBase(FontFamily_Style style);
00053                 
00054                 void render(FontFamilyData::FontFamily_Style style, int fontSize, const char *start_line){
00055                                 vector<string> lines;
00056         
00057                                 GLuint list_base= getStyleListBase(style); 
00058                                 
00059                                 const char * c = start_line;
00060                                 for(;*c;c++) {
00061                                         if(*c=='\n') {
00062                                                 string line;
00063                                                 for(const char *n=start_line;n<c;n++) line.append(1,*n);
00064                                                 lines.push_back(line);
00065                                                 start_line=c+1;
00066                                         }
00067                                 }
00068                                 if(start_line) {
00069                                         string line;
00070                                         for(const char *n=start_line;n<c;n++) line.append(1,*n);
00071                                         lines.push_back(line);
00072                                 }
00073                                 
00074 
00075                                 glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00076                                 
00077                                 glListBase(list_base);
00078         
00079                                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<lines.size();i++) {
00080                                         glPushMatrix();
00081                                         
00082                                         GLfloat scale = ((float)fontSize)/((float)h);
00083                                         glScalef(scale, scale, 1.0);
00084                                         
00085                                 //  The commented out raster position stuff can be useful if you need to
00086                                 //  know the length of the text that you are creating.
00087                                 //  If you decide to use it make sure to also uncomment the glBitmap command
00088                                 //  in make_dlist().
00089                                 //      glRasterPos2f(0,0);
00090                                         glCallLists(lines[i].length(), GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, lines[i].c_str());
00091                                 //      float rpos[4];
00092                                 //      glGetFloatv(GL_CURRENT_RASTER_POSITION ,rpos);
00093                                 //      float len=x-rpos[0];
00094         
00095                                         glPopMatrix();
00096                                 }
00097                                 
00098                                 glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00099         
00100                 }
00101                 
00102                 void loadFontFile(const string &fontFile) throw(FontFamilyData::FontFamilyData_Exception) {
00103                         if( fontFamily != getFontFile_FamilyName(fontFile) ){ throw FONTFILE_FONTFAMILY_MISMATCH; }
00104                         else{
00105                                 if( hasStyle(getFontFile_Style(fontFile)) ){ throw FONTSTYLE_ALREADY_EXISTS;}
00106                                 else{ loadFont(fontFile); }
00107                         }
00108                 }
00109                 
00110                 bool hasStyle(FontFamily_Style style){
00111                         switch(style){
00112                         case DEFAULT:
00113                                 return (defaultTextures != NULL);
00114                         case BOLD:
00115                                 return (boldTextures != NULL);
00116                         case ITALIC:
00117                                 return (italicTextures != NULL);
00118                         case BOLD_ITALIC:
00119                                 return (boldItalicTextures != NULL);
00120                         case UNSUPPORTED:
00121                                 return false;
00122                         }
00123                         return false;
00124                 }
00125                 
00126         private: 
00127                 void make_dlist ( FT_Face face, char ch, GLuint list_base, GLuint * tex_base );
00128                 void loadFont(const string &fontFile) throw(int);
00129         };
00130         
00131 }
